metadata.title: DKAPTURE | AI-Powered Digital Marketing Agency
metadata.description: AI-powered digital marketing agency for Brazilian entrepreneurs in the USA. We build your digital empire with visual storytelling, performance ads, and intelligent automation.
metadata.ogDescription: We build your digital empire with visual storytelling, performance ads, and AI-powered automation. For Brazilian entrepreneurs conquering the American market.

portfolio.title: Selected Work
portfolio.subtitle: Discover how we transform ideas into digital success stories.
portfolio.project1Desc: Complete digital rebrand and performance campaign for Miami's premier Brazilian restaurant chain. Grew online orders by 340% in 90 days.
portfolio.project2Desc: Lead generation machine for a home services company. Google Ads + SEO strategy that tripled qualified leads month over month.
portfolio.project3Desc: Luxury real estate branding with AI-powered virtual tours and targeted Meta campaigns reaching high-net-worth buyers.
portfolio.project4Desc: End-to-end event marketing including drone cinematography, social media campaigns, and influencer partnerships. 2M+ views across platforms.
portfolio.project5Desc: Complete digital transformation for a wellness brand. New website, booking system, and Instagram strategy that boosted revenue by 180%.
portfolio.project6Desc: Brand identity, food photography, and TikTok viral strategy for an emerging Brazilian steakhouse franchise expanding across Florida.

brandIdentity.title: Brand Identity & Image
brandIdentity.description: We craft the visual DNA that makes your brand unmistakable in the American market.
challenges: Brand doesn't stand out in a saturated market
Low perceived value due to amateur aesthetics
Disconnect between brand story and visuals
solutions: Cohesive brand guidelines for all platforms
Premium aesthetic that commands higher prices

logo.title: Logo & Visual Identity
logo.description: A comprehensive system including primary logo, variations, color palette, and typography.

guidelines.title: Brand Guidelines
guidelines.description: The rulebook for your brand to ensure consistency everywhere.

stationery.title: Stationery & Collateral
stationery.description: Physical and digital assets to professionalize your communication.

q1.question: How long does a branding project take?
q1.answer: Typically 4-6 weeks, depending on the scope and number of revisions.

q2.question: Do I own the copyright?
q2.answer: Yes, upon final payment, full copyright is transferred to you.

q3.question: What if I don't like the concepts?
q3.answer: We include multiple rounds of revisions to ensure you love the final result.

digitalPlatforms.title: Digital Platforms
digitalPlatforms.description: High-converting digital experiences built for performance and scale.
challenges: Website not converting visitors into leads
Hard to update or manage content

webDesign.title: Custom Web Design
webDesign.description: Tailor-made designs that reflect your brand's unique personality.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Solutions
ecommerce.description: Robust online stores designed to maximize sales.

seo.title: SEO & Performance
seo.description: Built from the ground up to rank high and load fast.

q1.question: Which platform do you use?
q1.answer: We primarily use Next.js for high performance, but also work with Shopify and WordPress depending on your needs.

q2.question: Is hosting included?
q2.answer: We can help set up hosting, but the subscription is typically paid directly by you to the provider.

q3.question: Will I be able to edit the site?
q3.answer: Yes, we integrate a CMS so you can easily update text and images.

visualStorytelling.title: Visual Storytelling
visualStorytelling.description: Cinematic content that captures attention and drives engagement.

videoProd.title: Video Production
videoProd.description: End-to-end production for commercials, social reels, and corporate videos.

photography.title: Professional Photography
photography.description: High-resolution imagery for your website, social media, and ads.

drone.title: Drone Cinematography
drone.description: Breathtaking aerial views to add production value.

q1.question: Do you travel for shoots?
q1.answer: Yes, we are based in Florida but travel nationwide and internationally.

q2.question: Who owns the raw footage?
q2.answer: Raw footage can be purchased for an additional fee; typically we deliver the final edited files.

growthPerformance.title: Growth & Performance
growthPerformance.description: Data-driven campaigns that turn ad spend into predictable revenue.

ads.title: Paid Advertising
ads.description: Expert management of Google, Meta, and TikTok ad campaigns.

crm.title: CRM & Automation
crm.description: Systems to nurture leads and automate follow-ups.

seo.title: Conversion Optimization
seo.description: Turning more of your existing traffic into paying customers.

q1.question: What is the minimum budget?
q1.answer: We generally recommend a minimum ad spend of $1,500/month to see significant results.

q2.question: How long until I see results?
q2.answer: Paid ads can generate leads immediately, but optimization for peak ROI typically takes 1-3 months.

aiLabPage.title: AI Intelligence Lab
aiLabPage.description: Proprietary AI tools built specifically for bilingual businesses.

chatbots.title: Bilingual AI Chatbots
chatbots.description: Smart assistants that qualify leads in English and Portuguese.

automation.title: Workflow Automation
automation.description: Connecting your apps to eliminate busywork.

analytics.title: Predictive Analytics
analytics.description: Using data to forecast trends and customer behavior.

q1.question: Will AI replace my team?
q1.answer: No, AI is designed to empower your team by handling repetitive tasks so they can focus on high-value work.

q2.question: Is it secure?
q2.answer: Yes, we prioritize data security and use enterprise-grade encryption and compliance standards.

discovery.description: We dive deep into your business goals, target audience, and current challenges.

strategy.description: Developing a roadmap tailored to achieve your specific objectives.

design.description: Crafting the visual elements and user experience.

delivery.description: Finalizing assets and handing off files or launching the project.

development.description: Coding the solution with clean, efficient technology.

launch.description: Deploying the project to the world.

production.description: Filming and capturing content on location or in studio.

postprod.description: Editing, color grading, sound design, and effects.

audit.description: Analyzing current performance to identify opportunities.

optimize.description: Continuous testing and refinement to improve results.

scale.description: Expanding reach and budget as ROI is proven.

integration.description: Connecting AI tools with your existing software stack.

training.description: Teaching the AI models on your specific data and knowledge base.

challenge.description: Urban Oasis needed to stand out in a saturated real estate market. Their previous website was converting at less than 1% and failed to capture the luxury essence of their properties.
challenge.quote: We were invisible in a crowded market. Dkapture gave us a voice and a face that our clients trust.

results.testimonial: The ROI has been incredible. We've seen a complete turnaround in our digital presence.

challenge.description: Neon Bistro struggled to fill tables on weeknights despite having great food.
challenge.quote: Our food was great, but our tables were empty. Now we're booked out weeks in advance.

results.testimonial: Dkapture aligned our digital vibe with our physical atmosphere perfectly.

challenge.description: Manual ticketing and registration processes were causing chaos.

results.testimonial: Automating our workflow saved us hundreds of hours.

challenge.description: Lacked a cohesive brand across channels.

results.testimonial: Now our brand tells a single, powerful story.

challenge.description: Nowhere to be found on Google.

results.testimonial: We are finally visible to the people who need us.

challenge.quote: We sell luxury, but our site looked cheap.

results.testimonial: The new site matches the caliber of our listings.
